item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Ana. Currently a grad student studying Cybersecurity @ NYU Tandon… whilst wrapping up a CS degree @ Merrimack College. This is my attempt to keep track of my coursework as I rate and review every online master’s course I’ve taken.
